snippet: Chile is backing off a plan to remove the word “dictatorship” from school textbooks in reference to the government of Gen. Augusto Pinochet
abstract: Chilean government backs off a plan to remove the word 'dictatorship' from school textbooks in reference to the government of Gen Augusto Pinochet in wake of a political uproar after plan was first publicized.
lead_paragraph: Chile is backing off a plan to remove the word “dictatorship” from school textbooks in reference to the government of Gen. Augusto Pinochet
